website_summaries.verdict: If you're willing to use MetroPCS' network, the ZTE ZMax Pro is a great big-screen phone for cheap.
pros: The ZTE ZMax Pro has a solid build, an expansive screen, and an exceptionally low price tag
cons: It's only available on MetroPCS for now, it doesn't have NFC, and the battery charges slowly
